UCxO_ya-RmAXCXJCU54AxYFw.title: New Frame Plus
UCxO_ya-RmAXCXJCU54AxYFw.description: New Frame Plus is a series about video game animation, created by Daniel Floyd (professional animator and co-creator of Extra Credits). If you came here hoping to nerd out about the animation in video games, then you've come to the RIGHT PLACE.

GxCcHOvSVJQ.title: The Animation of Sonic Games
GxCcHOvSVJQ.description: Which Sonic games have the best animation? Which have the worst? What makes for good animation in a Sonic game to begin with? Join me on this retrospective journey through ALL of them and let's find out. TAKE MY LEAD, I'LL SET YOU FREE.   ↵---- (More  Below)↵↵Support New Frame Plus on Patreon!↵http://www.patreon.com/newframeplus ↵↵↵Written and produced by Daniel Floyd↵↵Special thanks to:↵-Carrie Floyd↵-Soraya Een Hajji↵-Jocat↵↵__________↵↵Follow me on Twitter (@DanFloydPlus): https://twitter.com/DanFloydPlus↵↵For more games (and animation geekery), check out our other channel, PlayFrame! http://bit.ly/2lmGte8↵↵___________↵↵♪ "Tropical Resort" by Hyper Potions↵https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CaEpCuu0WMM↵↵♪ ...and selections from the Sonic game series official soundtracks.↵↵___________↵↵↵Table of Contents:↵↵0:00 - Intro↵↵1:35 - Ground Rules↵↵2:39 - Sonic the Hedgehog↵↵6:44 - Sonic the Hedgehog (8-bit)↵↵7:50 - Sonic the Hedgehog 2 (8-bit)↵↵8:43 - Sonic the Hedgehog 2↵↵11:01 - Sonic CD↵↵13:50 - Sonic Chaos↵↵14:26 - Sonic the Hedgehog 3↵↵16:42 - Sonic & Knuckles↵↵18:08 - Knuckles' Chaotix↵↵20:36 - What Makes Good Animation in a Sonic Game?↵↵22:43 - Sonic 3D Blast↵↵26:59 - Sonic Adventure↵↵34:09 - Sonic Adventure 2↵↵41:57 - The Mascot Suit Problem↵↵44:26 - Sonic Heroes↵↵48:49 - Shadow the Hedgehog↵↵53:10 - Sonic the Hedgehog (2006)↵↵59:52 - Sonic and the Secret Rings↵↵1:03:37 - Sonic Unleashed↵↵1:09:00 - Sonic and the Black Knight↵↵1:13:02 - Sonic the Hedgehog 4↵↵1:18:42 - Sonic Colors↵↵1:21:29 - Sonic Generations↵↵1:25:01 - Sonic Lost World↵↵1:27:54 - Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric↵↵1:31:03 - Sonic Mania↵↵1:34:18 - Sonic Forces↵↵1:37:13 - In Conclusion↵↵1:40:12 - Thoughts for the Future↵↵1:44:00 - Wrapping Up↵↵↵↵↵↵↵#Sonic #SonictheHedgehog #animation
